Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INTERNET AND TECHNOLOGY

Title: Relates to registration of certain companies whose primary business purpose is related to artificial intelligence
Summary: Requires the registration of certain companies whose primary business purpose is related to artificial intelligence as evidenced by their NAIC code.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring the registration of certain companies whose primary business purpose is related to artificial intelligence
